# SkillRank AI Development Checklist

- [x] **Verify Project Requirements**
  - Next.js 14 (App Router)
  - TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion
  - Strict Grayscale Design

- [x] **Scaffold the Project**
  - Created `skillrank-ai` directory
  - Initialized with `create-next-app` (App Router)
  - Downgraded to Next.js 14 and React 18 for compatibility

- [x] **Customize the Project**
  - Configured TailwindCSS (v3)
  - Added Font Configuration (Space Grotesk + Inter)
  - Created modular folder structure (`components`, `lib`, `hooks`, `context`)
  - Implemented Core Components:
    - [x] Loading Screen (Animated)
    - [x] Intro Page (Heading, tagline, scroll)
    - [x] Navbar (Responsive placeholder)
  - Set up Performance Best Practices (Lazy Loading via Next.js dynamic imports available if needed)

- [x] **Install Required Extensions**
  - None required beyond standard VS Code extensions for Next.js.

- [x] **Compile the Project**
  - Ran `npm run lint` successfully.

- [ ] **Launch the Project**
  - User can run `cd skillrank-ai && npm run dev`.

- [x] **Ensure Documentation is Complete**
  - Updated `README.md`.
